title.value: Стимулирование повышения качества молочного сырья сельскохозяйственных организаций
Stimulation of quality improvement of dairy raw materials of the agricultural organizations

journal.title: Problems of Economics : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Trigub, N.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there were considered the creation mechanism of the Special Stimulation Fund of Agricultural Commodity Producers. Using the example of the organizations of Vitebsk region of the Republic of Belarus, the calculations of its formation and dispensation were carried out. As a result of realized research it was revealed that the use of the proposed instrument of stimulation of quality improvement of dairy raw materials made it possible to increase profitability of milk producing and also improve the competitiveness of dairy products. Thus, the creation of the Special Stimulation Fund of Agricultural Commodity Producers helped smooth out differences in the profitability of production between agricultural producers and processors. Calculations showed that for every ton of milk variety 'Extra' agricultural producer would be paid extra 190 thousand Belarusian rubles of premium. This would make it possible for many enterprises to significantly improve the profitability of raw milk production. In addition, the proposed mechanism improved the competitiveness of dairy products as agricultural organizations interested in producing of better quality raw milk.
